org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline

Class ConstantItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.baseline.ConstantItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ItemScorer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalMeanRatingItemScorer

    @Shareable
public class ConstantItemScorer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemScorer, java.io.Serializable
    Rating scorer that predicts a constant rating for all items.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • score

        @Nonnull
public SparseVector score(long user,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score a collection of items.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • score

        public void score(long user,
                  @Nonnull
                  MutableSparseVector output)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        score in interface ItemScorer
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        output - The score vector.
